name: Bya
aboutpara: Software engineer with approximately 6 years of experience playing a key role in the development, maintenance, and deployment of complex enterprise software in high-performance and secure environments. Hands-on expertise in Big Data platforms and programming; back-end development and data engineering. Personable team player with experience collaborating with diverse cross-functional teams to deliver outstanding results.

Hands-on expertise in Big Data platforms and programming; back-end development and data engineering. I am passionate about learning new technologies and building scalable and reliable software. I am open to new opportunities and challenges. Feel free to reach out to me at

education.universityPara: I have completed my Bachelor's in Computer Science from UEC, Tokyo and currently pursuing my Master's in Computer Science from MIU, Iowa.
